sentence: The far-right candidate, Doug Mastriano, a conspiracy-theory-minded state senator, leads polls ahead of the Tuesday primary.
title: A Republican megadonor scrambled to stop Doug Mastriano in the Pennsylvania governor's race.

sentence: The aftershocks of Tuesdays big primaries are still rumbling across Pennsylvania, but one impact is already clear: Republican voters choice of Doug Mastriano in the governors race is giving the G.O.P.
title: Republican Panic Grows After Mastriano Wins
